item.title: Beat Angel Escalayer R
item.description: Abstract Beat Angel Escalayer R (BEAR) is a game made by AliceSoft, and its instructions are interprepted using Alicesoft’s proprietary virtual machine (VM): [[writeup/System Virtual Machine|System]].

item.title: Future Projects
item.description: Abstract Tools for future projects. https://kroki.io https://github.com/mermaid-js/mermaid https://docs.swimm.io --- title: CJaffaVM Class --- classDiagram class CJaffaVM{ +0x100 jj } CJaffaVM graph LR A[writeup/Rance IX] -- B class A internal-link; graph LR; bash -- onedrive -- systemctl; click bash "

item.title: Rance IX
item.description: Abstract Rance IX is a game made by AliceSoft, and its instructions are interpreted using Alicesoft’s proprietary virtual machine (VM): [[writeup/System Virtual Machine|System4]].

item.title: System Virtual Machine
item.description: Abstract System is a process virtual machine designed by AliceSoft to increase accessibility between different computer platforms. [!quote] Brief by AliceSoft Fandom

item.title: Technical Information Hub
item.description: Abstract This page collects technical information about things of interest. [[writeup/Beat Angel Escalayer R|Beat Angel Escalayer R]] [[writeup/Rance IX|Rance IX]] [[writeup/System Virtual Machine|System VM]]

item.title: 日本語
item.description: 概要 この欄は日本語を学ぶためものです。 日本語は私の第一言語ではありません。でも私は学びたいです。 よろしくお願いします。 リンク [[日本語/記事を読みました|記事を読みました]]
